Notes.Text:
This update for ppp fixes the following security issue:

- CVE-2020-8597: Fixed a buffer overflow in the eap_request and eap_response functions (bsc#1162610).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: eap.c in pppd in ppp 2.4.2 through 2.4.8 has an rhostname buffer overflow in the eap_request and eap_response functions.
